Package com.android

Class MeatStorage

java.lang.Object
com.android.MeatStorage
public class MeatStorage
extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int counter
    keeps a count of how many singletons are created, this will be initialised in the static initializer
    private static MeatStorage instance
    create our MeatStorage singleton reference and using a static initialisiation block to give it a value this is final, so it HAS to be given a value this will only run ONCE and as this is static, this will be run ONCE and will be the very first thing that will be run when we first access the class in anyway.
    private int quantity
    amount of kilos of meat at the start of the day, this would be the amount of meat from the previous day, plus any deliveries of meat that were made.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private MeatStorage()
    constructor that creates a MeathStorage object that should only run ONCE, if it correctly a singleton

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addMeat​(int amount)
    method is the same method to add meat to the fridge as the HayStorage addHay method
    static MeatStorage getInstance()
    allows us to get the instance of the MeatStore class singleton
    boolean removeMeat​(int amount)
    method is the same method to take meat from the fridge as the HayStorage removeHay method
    String toString()
    toString method that prints out the amount of meat in the fridge

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • instance

      private static final MeatStorage instance
      create our MeatStorage singleton reference and using a static initialisiation block to give it a value this is final, so it HAS to be given a value this will only run ONCE and as this is static, this will be run ONCE and will be the very first thing that will be run when we first access the class in anyway. To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial

    • quantity

      private int quantity
      amount of kilos of meat at the start of the day, this would be the amount of meat from the previous day, plus any deliveries of meat that were made. for our purposes we hard code in a value of 200 kilos

    • counter

      private static int counter
      keeps a count of how many singletons are created, this will be initialised in the static initializer

  • Constructor Details

    • MeatStorage

      private MeatStorage()
      constructor that creates a MeathStorage object that should only run ONCE, if it correctly a singleton

  • Method Details

    • addMeat

      public void addMeat​(int amount)
      method is the same method to add meat to the fridge as the HayStorage addHay method

    • removeMeat

      public boolean removeMeat​(int amount)
      method is the same method to take meat from the fridge as the HayStorage removeHay method

    • toString

      public String toString()
      toString method that prints out the amount of meat in the fridge
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getInstance

      public static MeatStorage getInstance()
      allows us to get the instance of the MeatStore class singleton
